attributes.action: stop tesco opening more tescos stores and allow fair competition for other supermarkets to operate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like the prime minister to put a cap on the amount of stores opened by tesco to give small shops and other supermarkets the chance to compete

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
